name: Infestation sim
description:
Made at Berlin Mini Game-jam february 2017.


How to play:

Jump from host to host.

You win when you have infested all the hosts.

If you die while on a host you loose.

Can be played with keyboard or controller

Keyboard controls:

Select target: arrow keys, wasd

jump to target: space

rotate camera: Q and E

Quit game: Escape

Restart game: R



Disclaimer:

Made at a gamejam.

No guarantee that it will run whatsoever
